description:
Winger Gervais is a 32 year-old Hispanic Male.

Winger Gervais is a hardened raider and member of the Sudden-Death Overtime icegang. He has a scar running across his left cheek and wears makeshift hockey gear over his tattered clothing. His eyes constantly dart around, always on the lookout for threats or opportunities. Winger is known for his aggressive playing style and his obsession with the pre-War sport of ice hockey, which he learned about from Goalie Ledoux.

Winger Gervais's Personality: Winger is aggressive, territorial, and fiercely loyal to his gang. He lives for the thrill of the game and the violence that comes with it. He's quick-tempered and prone to outbursts, but he's also cunning and knows when to retreat. Despite his rough exterior, he has a strange code of honor when it comes to the game, which he follows with religious devotion.

Winger Gervais's Backstory: Winger grew up in the ruins of what was once a vibrant Hispanic community in the Capitol Wasteland. After his family was killed by raiders, he was taken in by Goalie Ledoux, who saw potential in the young boy's ferocity. Ledoux introduced him to the stories of ice hockey, a sport his ancestors played before the Great War. Winger became obsessed with this forgotten sport and quickly rose through the ranks of the Sudden-Death Overtime gang, earning his position through his ruthless efficiency on the ice and in combat. He now sees the gang as his family and the sport as his true calling.
